drop_database: Remove the 'test' database if it exists.
create_database: Create a new database named 'test' if it doesn't already exist.
drop_tables: Remove the 'Authors' table if it exists.
Remove the 'Books' table if it exists.
Remove the 'Publishers' table if it exists.
create_tables: Create a new 'Authors' table with columns for AuthorID (auto-incrementing), FirstName, LastName, BirthDate, and Nationality.
Create a new 'Publishers' table with columns for PublisherID (auto-incrementing), PublisherName, Address, and Country.
Create a new 'Books' table with columns for BookID (auto-incrementing), Title, Genre, PublishedYear, AuthorID, and PublisherID, with foreign key relationships to the Authors and Publishers tables.

delete: Remove the author with ID 1 from the Authors table.
Remove the author named Jane Austen from the Authors table.
Remove all American authors from the Authors table.
Remove all authors born before January 1, 1900 from the Authors table.
Remove authors named George or with the last name Joyce from the Authors table.
Remove British authors born before January 1, 1800 from the Authors table.
Remove authors with ID greater than 5 from the Authors table.
Remove authors whose last name starts with 'Fitz' from the Authors table.
Remove the author named J.K. Rowling who is British from the Authors table.
Remove authors born between January 1, 1800 and January 1, 1900 from the Authors table.
Remove the book with ID 10 from the Books table.
Remove the book titled '1984' from the Books table.
Remove Romance books published before 1900 from the Books table.
Remove books published in 1925 or 1934 from the Books table.
Remove books by the author with ID 3 from the Books table.
Remove Fantasy books published by the publisher with ID 2 from the Books table.
Remove books with titles starting with 'Harry Potter' from the Books table.
Remove books with no published year from the Books table.
Remove books in the Magic Realism or Modernist Novel genres from the Books table.
Remove books published by publisher with ID 1 and written by author with ID 4 from the Books table.
Remove the publisher with ID 5 from the Publishers table.
Remove all publishers in the United States from the Publishers table.
Remove publishers with 'University' in their name from the Publishers table.
Remove publishers with addresses in New York from the Publishers table.

Remove publishers with no address from the Publishers table.
Remove publishers with ID less than 3 from the Publishers table.
Remove publishers whose names start with 'Hachette' from the Publishers table.
Remove publishers in the United States or France from the Publishers table.
update: Change the nationality of the author with last name Orwell to British.
Change the first name of the author with last name Rowling and birth date July 31, 1965 to Joanne.
Set the birth date of the British author with last name Woolf to January 25, 1882.
Change the last name of the Irish author named James to Joyce.
Change the nationality of authors with last name Twain or Hemingway to American.
Change the first name of the British author with last name Orwell to George.
Set the birth date of the author with last name Hemingway to July 21, 1899.
Change the last name of the Colombian author García Márquez to Garcia Marquez.
Change the nationality of the author with last name Tolstoy to Russian.
Change the first name to Leo and nationality to Russian for the author with last name Tolstoy.
Change the genre of the book '1984' to Science Fiction.
Change the published year of the book 'Animal Farm' in the Political Satire genre to 1945.
Change the genre to Fantasy and published year to 1997 for the book 'Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone'.
Change the title of the book with ID 6 to 'The Adventures of Tom Sawyer'.
Change the genre to Magic Realism for books by author with ID 7 or titled 'One Hundred Years of Solitude'.
Change the published year to 1925 for the book 'The Great Gatsby' in the Tragedy genre.
Change the genre to Modernist Novel for the book 'Mrs. Dalloway' by author with ID 9.
Change the publisher to the one with ID 2 for the book 'Pride and Prejudice' in the Romance genre.
Change the title to 'Ulysses' and genre to Modernist Novel for the book with ID 19.
Change the publisher to the one with ID 4 for the book '1984' by author with ID 1.
Change the address of Penguin Random House to '21 New Oxford Street, London, UK'.
Change the country of Oxford University Press to United Kingdom.
Change the name of publishers with ID 2 or 3 to 'Harper & Brothers'.
Change the country to United States and address to '123 Broadway, New York, NY' for the publisher with ID 5.
Change the address to '123 Fourth Street, New York, NY' for HarperCollins in the United States.
Change the name of the publisher with ID 6 in the United States to 'Scholastic Inc.'.
Change the country to France and address to '20 Avenue de l'Opéra, Paris' for Hachette Livre.
Change the name of the publisher with ID 9 in the United Kingdom to 'Pearson Plc'.
Change the address of Simon & Schuster to '32 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY'.
Change the name of the publisher with ID 10 in the United States to 'Harvard Press'.

no_filtering: Retrieve all AuthorIDs from the Authors table.
Retrieve all BookIDs from the Books table.
Retrieve all PublisherIDs from the Publishers table.
Retrieve all unique AuthorIDs from the Authors table.
single_filtering: Find the AuthorIDs of all British authors.
Find the BookIDs of all Fantasy books.
Find the PublisherIDs of all publishers in the United States.
Find the AuthorIDs of all authors born after January 1, 1900.
double_filtering: Find the AuthorIDs of all British authors born after January 1, 1900.
Find the BookIDs of all Fantasy books published after 2000.
Find the PublisherIDs of all publishers in the United States with addresses in New York.
Find the BookIDs of all Dystopian books or books published before 1950.
triple_filtering: Find the AuthorIDs of all British authors born after January 1, 1900 with the last name Orwell.
Find the BookIDs of all Fantasy books published after 2000 with titles starting with 'Harry Potter'.
Find the PublisherIDs of all publishers in the United States with addresses in New York and named Penguin Random House.
Find the AuthorIDs of all American authors, or authors born after January 1, 1900 with the last name Hemingway.
range_filtering: Find the AuthorIDs of all authors born between January 1, 1900 and December 31, 1950.
Find the BookIDs of all books published between 1990 and 2000.
Find the PublisherIDs of publishers with IDs between 1 and 10.
Find the AuthorIDs of authors with IDs between 5 and 15.
ranking: Retrieve all AuthorIDs, ordered by birth date from earliest to latest.
Retrieve all BookIDs, ordered by published year from latest to earliest.
Retrieve all PublisherIDs, ordered by publisher name alphabetically.
Retrieve all AuthorIDs, ordered by last name alphabetically descending, then by first name alphabetically ascending.
count: Count the total number of authors.
Count the total number of books.
Count the total number of publishers.
Count the number of American authors.
single_table: Find the AuthorIDs of all British authors.
Find the BookIDs of all Fantasy books.
Find the PublisherIDs of all publishers in the United Kingdom.
Find the AuthorIDs of all authors born before January 1, 1900.
double_table: Find the BookIDs of all books written by British authors.
Find the BookIDs of all books published by publishers in the United States.
Find the AuthorIDs of all authors who have written Fantasy books.
Find the PublisherIDs of all publishers who have published books after 2000.
three_table: Find the BookIDs of all books written by British authors and published by publishers in the United States.
Find the AuthorIDs of all authors who have written Fantasy books published by publishers in the United Kingdom.
Find the PublisherIDs of all publishers who have published books by authors born before January 1, 1900.
Find the BookIDs of all books written by Orwell and published by Penguin Random House.
